D3plus

Workshop 1: November 19th, 2013

Intro D3js Data and Attributes Tree Map Stacked Pie Scatter Network Rings Future Development

What is D3plus?

  • Data Visualizations made easy.

  • A javascript library building upon D3

  • Open Source

What D3plus is not:

  • A replacement for D3

  • Finished!

Workshop Topics

  • What is D3 and how much of it do I need to know?

  • How should my data be formatted to use D3plus?

  • How can I build and modify visualizations?
